mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM pret_translated_s WHERE evaluationvalue_s < 5 ORDER BY translatednum_s ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM pret_translated_m WHERE evaluationvalue_m < 5 ORDER BY translatednum_m ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: insert into pret_evaluation_s (evaluationnum_s, translatednum_s, requestnum_s, memberid, evaluationsuccess , whyfailed) values (pret_evals_seq.nextval, #{translatednum_s}, #{requestnum_s}, #{memberid}, #{evaluationsuccess} , #{whyfailed})

insert into pret_evaluation_m (evaluationnum_m, translatednum_m, requestnum_m, memberid, evaluationsuccess , whyfailed) values (pret_evalm_seq.nextval, #{translatednum_m}, #{requestnum_m}, #{memberid}, #{evaluationsuccess} , #{whyfailed})
mapper.update: update pret_translated_s set evaluationvalue_s = evaluationvalue_s + 1 where translatednum_s = #{translatednum_s}
update pret_translated_m set evaluationvalue_m = evaluationvalue_m + 1 where translatednum_m = #{translatednum_m}
update pret_request_s set requestcondition_s = 'Y' where requestnum_s = #{requestnum_s}

update pret_request_m set requestcondition_m = 'Y' where requestnum_m = #{requestnum_m}
update pret_request_m set requestcondition_m = 'N', memberid2 = '' where requestnum_m = #{requestnum_m}
